name: angela-3d

scripts.setup: npm run env && npm run build && npm run start && npm run pull
scripts.up: docker compose up -d && docker compose logs -f
scripts.pull: docker compose exec ollama ollama pull ${OLLAMA_MODEL:-qwen2.5:7b}
scripts.ollama:models: docker compose exec ollama ollama list
scripts.ruff: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.ruff:fix: cd backend && uv run ruff check . --fix && uv run ruff format .
scripts.mypy: cd backend && uv run mypy app
scripts.lint: npm run ruff && npm run mypy && npm run biome && npm run tsc && npm run stylelint
scripts.check: npm run ruff && npm run mypy && npm run tsc
scripts.health: curl -sf http://localhost:${PORT:-7200}/health && echo ' healthy' || echo ' unhealthy'
